title: Broken-Hearted Kasumin
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Ugh......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Kasumi-chan, what’s wrong?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin got a bad score on a final exam again. It’s so frustrating......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Honoka-chan said something like that to me too......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Honoka-senpai too?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Yeah. But she has her own ways of cheering herself up......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin is in tremendous pain from what happened, so it won’t be that easy to cheer her up......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>How about I make Kasumi’s favorite parfait with tons of toppings!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Really!? Kasumin will definitely cheer up by having Kotori-senpai’s cheesecake parfait!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>For sure! I’ll put on tons of ice cream, fruits, chocolate, and whipped cream~ ♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>How reenergizing~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
